website_summaries.verdict: Dubbed by some sites as the ‘poor man’s NMD,’ the X_PLR shoe from Adidas Originals is appreciated by most buyers as they are well-crafted despite its affordable price. There are also those who love how versatile this shoe is, saying that they save time planning their outfits because this model goes well with almost anything they have on their wardrobe. The Adidas X_PLR’s comfort, aesthetics, and performance clearly add value to this shoe.
pros: A lot of reviewers love the fact that this pair of kicks is so affordable
A good number of buyers appreciate so much how well-crafted this pair of sneakers is
The Adidas X_PLR sneakers are versatile enough to be worn with trousers, jeans, shorts, and even skirts for the ladies
Many users are quite surprised by the durability of the sneaker
A lot of purchasers say that the Adidas X_PLR is among the most comfortable Adidas shoes that they have ever owned
Quite a lot of users appreciate the modern profile and refreshing look of the Adidas X_PLR shoes
Some users claim that despite it being dubbed as “the poor man’s NMD,” it has the minimalist good looks and the comfort that matches expensive running shoes
The mesh-lined knit uppers are incredibly breathable, some wearers have attested
A handful of commenters say the speed lacing and back pull tabs help in quickly putting on and removing the Adidas X_PLR sneaker
One user heaps praise on the Ortholite sockliner that keep the interior of the shoe well cushioned and comfortable for all-day use
cons: Some of those who have written reviews think that this shoe is too much of a downgrade from the NMDs
A few commenters notice that the laces of the Adidas X_PLR break easily

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic
customer_reviews.text: My partner loves these trainers. A year on and they still look good as new despite frequent wear. Fit was perfect (he is size 10) and the design and quality is great as you would expect from Adidas. Looks exactly as the photo shows and they look well with jeans or jogging bottoms.
customer_reviews.author: Suzannah Owens

customer_reviews.title: Broke after 4 wears
customer_reviews.text: Shoe lace adjuster plastic button broke and fell apart after 4 runs
customer_reviews.author: DizZy

customer_reviews.title: Most Comfortable Trainer
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable trainer. Have always had Adidas brand and these haven't let me done either. Well made, strong material.
customer_reviews.author: Michael

customer_reviews.title: Decent trainers
customer_reviews.text: Maybe slightly larger than I expected, but I can possibly attribute that to the fit of a style of trainer I've never had before. They are still very comfortable despite this and they look as good in real life as they do in the pictures. Happy
customer_reviews.author: Daniel Longstone

customer_reviews.title: Service great...product shabby...
customer_reviews.text: Lovely trainers but while lacing jp an eyehole split on first use...cant be bothered going through sending back ect as actally need them and Im on a budget so Ill live with it...but Shabby Workmanship Adidas xx 30 years a fan...not anymore...
customer_reviews.author: Joe Royle

customer_reviews.title: Bad eyelets.
customer_reviews.text: I have had these shoes since January, the eyelets have broken so not able to wear shoes. For the amount I paid for them ,not happy
customer_reviews.author: Alfie voisey

customer_reviews.title: I loved the shoes for sure
customer_reviews.text: I loved the shoes for sure. The quality is as good as the brand and price. The Fit is 95% to my feet. Colour is as what I expected beautiful very airy and comfortable. I would definitely recommend this pair of shoes.
customer_reviews.author: Clive

customer_reviews.title: Very happy customer
customer_reviews.text: Little tight over the top of my foot but I absolutely love them! They are quite comfy (regardless of first comment) and look really smart. I bought in white and spilt coffee on them the first day (idiot) but, came right out! Great product!
customer_reviews.author: Callum James Lipscombe

customer_reviews.title: Adequate trainers but has an elastic band that fits across ...
customer_reviews.text: Adequate trainers but has an elastic band that fits across the bridge of your foot, to me this is a bit discomforting so mine were trimmed off.
customer_reviews.author: Rosbif

customer_reviews.title: Perfect present
customer_reviews.text: They were a present, & they were very happy with them.
customer_reviews.author: graham dawson

customer_reviews.title: AWESOME
customer_reviews.text: AWESOME product! Very ,very confortable! Soooo smooth ! It's almost like you have no shoes on And it looks AMAZING!
customer_reviews.author: edmundo

customer_reviews.title: highly recommend!
customer_reviews.text: These shoes are amazing and very comfortable, but the fit is slightly larger than my other adidas shoes. Thankfully the design and fit of the shoe minus it being slightly too large was amazing. very comfortable and nice looking, highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Katie Smith

customer_reviews.title: Good price for good shoes
customer_reviews.text: Much cheaper than the high street prices and the exact design I wanted too
customer_reviews.author: Jacko

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable trainer.
customer_reviews.text: A very comfortable shoe which is ideal for anyone who's on their feet for long periods of time.
customer_reviews.author: Trad Skin

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great fit, very comfortable and good price. Shall be buying second pair.
customer_reviews.author: Mr. Jon-paul Surrell

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: Prefect Fit, looks amazing, feels amazing. My son loves it..
customer_reviews.author: BeLLe

customer_reviews.title: Great shoes
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic pair of shoes so comfy I got size 10.5
customer_reviews.author: Barry

customer_reviews.title: Really like them
customer_reviews.text: The shoes are almost perfect. Just a tiny bit too small cause I like to have a little space between the finger and the shoe but that was my mistake. For tge rest of it the shipping took a little bit than it normally does but still fast! And shoes look really great!
customer_reviews.author: Rodrigo

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Lovely fitting shoes well worth the price and love the lassless design
customer_reviews.author: Laine Hobbs

customer_reviews.title: Good trainers
customer_reviews.text: Really comfy casual trainers, not used for sports so not sure whether good for running etc,
customer_reviews.author: Daniel Chilton

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Confortable and very fast shipping. Ordered on a sunday, received it on a tuesday
customer_reviews.author: Nuno N.

customer_reviews.title: Excellent!
customer_reviews.text: Excellent quality, one of the comfiest trainers I've ever purchased, very quick delivery would recommend to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: Bradley J.
